definition: thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder

sentences.english: Phenethylamine is also a skin irritant and possible sensitizer.
sentences.chinese: 苯乙胺也是皮膚刺激劑與可能的感光劑。

sentences.english: You may eventually reach a point in the CRF progression when an appetite stimulant is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 你可能終究面臨CRF進展到需要食慾刺激劑的時候。

sentences.english: Nicotine is a stimulant, with effects similar to caffeine.
sentences.chinese: 尼古丁是刺激劑，它有和咖啡因相似的作用。

sentences.english: Stimulants are drugs such as Cocaine, and amphetamines, hallucinogens and marijuana.
sentences.chinese: 刺激劑包括可卡因，安非他明，迷幻劑和大麻。
